name: Spirit Journey
description:
Travel through the spirit world. Each death leaves a behind a statue that you can use to get past obstacles.

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/spirit-journey

Keyboard:
Movement - Arrow Keys 
Jump - Space
Die - r

Gamepad:
Movement - d-pad
Jump - a
Die - b

Team: 
Christoph Schoch 
Daniel Rodermel
Piotr Bugaj
